execution_plan.description: Find goods ids that are bakery items.
execution_plan.query: SELECT goods.id AS s1__id FROM goods WHERE goods.food = 'bakery'

execution_plan.description: Find receipts that include those bakery goods.
execution_plan.query: SELECT items.Receipt AS s2__Receipt, items.Item AS s2__Item FROM items WHERE items.Item IN ($step1.s1__id)

execution_plan.description: Map those receipts to customers (get customer IDs for each receipt).
execution_plan.query: SELECT receipts.ReceiptNumber AS s3__ReceiptNumber, receipts.CustomerId AS s3__CustomerId FROM receipts WHERE receipts.ReceiptNumber IN ($step2.s2__Receipt)

execution_plan.description: Get customer last names for the customers who appear on those receipts.
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.id AS s4__id, customers.lastname AS s4__lastname FROM customers WHERE customers.id IN ($step3.s3__CustomerId)
